sourcesContent:
import {React ,useState,} from 'react' import {useHistory, ReactDOM} from 'react-router-dom'; import './App.css' import UserProfile from './UserProfile'; function Recipebox() { const [searchType, setSearchType] = useState(''); const [searchCriteria, setSearchCriteria] = useState(''); const [meals, setMeals] = useState(""); const [meal_ids, setMeal_ids] = useState(""); const [recipeData, setRecipeData]= useState(""); const [day,setDay] = useState(''); console.log(UserProfile.getName()); function add(e){ setSearchCriteria([...searchCriteria, e]); } function refresh(){ setSearchCriteria(''); setSearchType(''); setMeal_ids(''); setMeals(''); } function send(){ fetch("/getsuggestions", { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify( {'searchCritria': searchCriteria,"searchType": searchType }), }).then((response) => response.json()).then((data) => { console.log(data); for(var [key , value] of Object.entries(data)){ setMeals([...meals, value]); setMeal_ids([...meal_ids, key]); console.log(meals); } }); return; } const history = useHistory(); function recipe_page(e){ console.log(e); fetch("/recipepage", { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify( {"id": e }), }).then((response) => response.json()).then((data) => { console.log(data); setRecipeData(data); }); } function route(){ let path = '/Recipepage'; history.push( { pathname: path, state: {detail: recipeData} }); } function addToBoard(e){ console.log(e); } function addToDay(e){ console.log(e); //heroReactDOM.render(

) } return(

{UserProfile.getName()}'s Mealboard

Search For Recipes

setSearchType('ingredients') }type="checkbox" name="ingreds" value="Search by Ingredients"/>

add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="lettuce"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Rice"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Apple"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Garlic"/>

add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Egg"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Corn"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Cheese"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Mushroom"/>

add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="butter"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Flour"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="onion"/> add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="checkbox" value="Orange"/>

add(e.target.value)} id="ingreds" type="text"/>
setSearchType('calories')} type="checkbox" name="calories" value="Search by Calories"/>
add(e.target.value)} id="calories" type="text"/>
setSearchType('diet')} type="checkbox" name="diet" value="Search by Diet"/>
setSearchType('cuisine')} type="checkbox" name="cuisine" value="Search by Cuisine"/>

); } export default Recipebox;
